tool_description: An API showing all the latest Cryptocurrency News along with NFT and Decentralized Finance (DeFi) News around the world
name: Cryptocurrency News Live
title: Cryptocurrency News Live

api_list.name: Get All NFT And Decentralized Finance News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about NFT and Decentralized Finance (DeFi) from various news resources like Cryptonews, CoinTelegraph, NewsBTC from all over the world.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com/NFT_DeFi"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Cryptocurrency News From Individual Source
api_list.description: Get Cryptocurrency News articles from a specific news resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com/news/Cryptonews"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Cryptocurrency News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back  all news articles about Cryptocurrency from various news sources like CoinDesk, CoinTelegraph, Cryptonews, NewsBTC, TheEconomicTimes from all over the world
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
